Text: It might not show it, but as of Friday, July 21st 2006, this file is being seeded by me. I'll keep it up for at least a few weeks, probably even a few months, except during online gaming sessions. So,there should almost always be at least one seed.
Hey cavalierlwt, is this the version with the deleted scenes or just the original movie?  I'd like to see the new scenes.  Great movie though.  Thanks.
this is the original, no new scenes that I noticed.
